joke: What's green and smells like pork? Kermit's Fingers.
quote: I have this really high priority on happiness and finding something to be happy about.

joke: Why did the chicken cross the road, roll in the mud and cross the road again? He was a dirty double-crosser!
quote: When I was a child people simply looked about them and were moderately happy; today they peer beyond the seven seas, bury themselves waist deep in tidings, and by and large what they see and hear makes them unutterably sad.

joke:
A neutron walks into a bar and asks for a price on a drink.
The barkeeper says: "For you... no charge!"
quote: There can be no happiness if the things we believe in are different from the things we do.

joke: "We messed up the keming again guys."
quote: Happy is the man who has broken the chains which hurt the mind, and has given up worrying once and for all.

joke: What does tofu and a dildo have in common? They're both meat substitutes.
quote: He who never sacrificed a present to a future good or a personal to a general one can speak of happiness only as the blind do of colors.
